name: SHUFFLE
description:
GAME AVAILABLE ON Google  Play!

The game is an endless Shoot 'em up with arcade elements. This is a good time killer in all cases.

What is Arcade?
Arcades can be distinguished by the short and intense gameplay they provide. In the truest sense, these are games for slot machines, or ported from them to other platforms. But over time, the definition of this genre has become more vague and now almost any game in which there is a fast gameplay can be called arcade, in which there is practically no plot, many lives or the opportunity to revive.
The game is easy to control. Dodge asteroids, shoot down enemy spaceships, collect coins and score as many points as possible.
